subject: Electrical Technology

overview.description: Comprehensive electrical technology curriculum providing hands-on training in electrical systems, power generation, control circuits, and modern electrical applications for technical career preparation

learning_objectives: Master fundamental electrical and electronic principles
Develop practical skills in electrical installation and maintenance
Understand power systems and renewable energy technologies
Apply electrical safety protocols and industry standards
Prepare for electrical trades and engineering technology careers

units.title: Electrical Fundamentals and Circuit Analysis
learning_outcomes: Understand basic electrical concepts and laws
Analyze DC and AC circuits using theoretical and practical methods
Use electrical measuring instruments and testing equipment
Apply Ohm's law and Kirchhoff's laws to solve circuit problems

lessons.title: Circuit Construction and Analysis Laboratory
objectives: Build and analyze series, parallel, and combination circuits
Use multimeters and oscilloscopes for circuit measurements
Verify theoretical calculations with practical measurements

activities.description: Build various DC and AC circuits on breadboards and training modules
Use digital multimeters and oscilloscopes to measure electrical parameters
Compare measured values with theoretical calculations and analyze differences
Identify and repair faults in electrical circuits

units.title: Electrical Installation and Wiring Systems
learning_outcomes: Understand electrical codes and safety standards
Install and wire residential and commercial electrical systems
Use electrical tools and equipment properly
Apply proper grounding and protection methods

lessons.title: Residential Wiring Installation Project
objectives: Install complete residential electrical circuits following code requirements
Wire outlets, switches, and lighting fixtures properly
Install and connect electrical panels and circuit breakers

activities.description: Install complete electrical system in residential wiring trainer
Install and wire electrical distribution panels and circuit breakers
Inspect installation for code compliance and safety standards
Test all circuits and systems for proper operation

cross_curricular_connections: Building Technology: Construction methods and materials
Safety Education: Electrical safety and hazard prevention

units.title: Power Systems and Renewable Energy
learning_outcomes: Understand power generation, transmission, and distribution
Analyze three-phase power systems and transformers
Design and install renewable energy systems
Apply power quality and energy efficiency concepts

lessons.title: Solar Power System Design and Installation
objectives: Design photovoltaic solar power systems for residential applications
Install solar panels and power conditioning equipment
Connect grid-tied and off-grid solar systems

activities.description: Calculate energy requirements and design appropriate solar power system
Install solar panels, inverters, and battery storage systems
Connect and test complete solar power system operation
Monitor system performance and analyze energy production data

cross_curricular_connections: Environmental Science: Renewable energy and sustainability
Mathematics: Energy calculations and system optimization

units.title: Industrial Control Systems and Automation
learning_outcomes: Understand industrial control systems and motor drives
Program and troubleshoot Programmable Logic Controllers (PLCs)
Design and implement automated control systems
Apply Human-Machine Interface (HMI) and SCADA systems

lessons.title: Motor Control and PLC Programming Laboratory
objectives: Install and wire motor control circuits and drives
Program PLCs for industrial automation applications
Design and implement automated production systems

activities.description: Install and wire three-phase motor control circuits with starters and drives
Program PLCs using ladder logic for process control applications
Design complete automated system for manufacturing process
Develop Human-Machine Interface for system monitoring and control

cross_curricular_connections: Computer Technology: Programming and system integration

workshop_projects: Complete electrical installation for simulated building
Design and build renewable energy demonstration system
Industrial automation cell programming and commissioning
safety_training: Arc flash protection and personal protective equipment
Electrical code compliance and inspection procedures
Emergency response and first aid for electrical incidents
capstone_projects: Smart home automation system design and implementation
Energy audit and efficiency improvement project
Renewable energy system for community application

safety_certifications: NFPA 70E Electrical Safety in the Workplace
technical_certifications: National Center for Construction Education and Research (NCCER) Electrical
International Brotherhood of Electrical Workers (IBEW) pre-apprenticeship
NABCEP Solar PV Installation Professional certification
professional_development: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers (IEEE) student membership

equipment_and_facilities: Electrical training laboratory with power supplies and meters
Motor control and PLC training stations
textbooks_and_materials: National Electrical Code and local electrical codes
Motor control and industrial automation manuals
digital_resources: Online electrical code references and updates
